overview: As we approach the one year mark of the stress-inducing pandemic, the tools we use to regulate our nervous systems to stay calm in the face of disruption are increasingly valuable.  "Soft Wiring" follows an Oakland-based craniosacral therapist, Andrea Byers as she transitions her bodywork practice to remotely seeing infants and their caregivers, guiding them through the most critical point in their babies young lives: how to "wire" their nervous systems.
title: Soft Wiring
